title: Blood Calls to Blood (1968) Spaghetti Western | Spanish

sources.title: Blood Calls to Blood (1968) Spaghetti Western | Spanish
sources.description:
In a frontier town between the USA and Mexico, Sancho and his gang raid a monastery, stealing a valuable artwork. After Andrej, a lone cowboy, learns his brother, a monk, was lost in the attack, he sets out to find the gang. Meanwhile, the outlaws turn on each other, fighting over the stolen treasure.

This film is available with Spanish & Polish audio, and subtitles in many languages

Original title: Sangue chiama sangue (1968)
Alternative titles: El sancho... c'est le temps de mourir, Sangre llama sangre, Blood Draws Blood, Blood Calls For Blood, La sangre llama a la sangre

Director: Luigi Capuano
Writer: Fulvio Pazziloro
Stars: Fernando Sancho, Stephen Forsyth, Germ√°n Cobos
Genres: Action, Drama, Western

1:27:23 Andrew and Micaela clash over the stolen tiara

Country of origin Italy
Release date April 6, 1968 (Italy)
